remarks: The order of an element of a finite group divides the order (cardinality) of the group.  Corollary of Lagrange's theorem for the order of a subgroup.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 14-Jan-2015.)
statement:
odcl2.1 $e |- X = ( Base ` G ) $.
odcl2.2 $e |- O = ( od ` G ) $.
oddvds2 $p |- ( ( G e. Grp /\ X e. Fin /\ A e. X ) -> ( O ` A ) || ( # ` X ) ) $.
